channel.title: [HELP] Whoever helps me with hosting a server on a linux VPS gets 1 month!
channel.description:
Here is the speedtest; [IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1396001542.png[/img] [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/7629/screenshotseu.png[/img] [i]^Posted this kind of thread on another forum, and got called a scammer so I took this picture, might aswell post here^[/i]
So how can I host my server on Linux Ubuntu? All I know is it's called "Linux Ubuntu Desktop i386", it's 64 bit and it's running 24/7.
I also believe it's version 11.04
I have the source right in front my eyes, it's Project Insanity, and it has a file called "Run.bat"
Normally you just click it, but .bat is just for windows, so how can I convert and run it?
Thanks a lot, and whoever SOLVES the problem, will get 24/7 for 1 month, free hosting, Guaranteed, no scam.

item.title: [HELP] Whoever helps me with hosting a server on a linux VPS gets 1 month!
